Items.Name: Bill Dozer
Attributes: When you use another Friend, this gains (  10  » 20  » 30   ) damage for the fight.
Your other Friends' cooldowns are reduced by (  10%  » 20%  » 30%   ).

Enchantments.Name: Shielded
Enchantments.Effect: Shield equal to this item's damage.

Enchantments.Name: Restorative
Enchantments.Effect: Heal equal to this item's Damage.

Enchantments.Name: Toxic
Enchantments.Effect: Poison equal to 10% of this item's damage.

Enchantments.Name: Fiery
Enchantments.Effect: Burn equal to 10% of this item's damage.

Enchantments.Name: Radiant
Enchantments.Effect: This cannot be Frozen, Slowed or Destroyed.

Enchantments.Name: Heavy
Enchantments.Effect: The first time you fall below half health each fight, Slow all enemy items for 4 second(s).

Enchantments.Name: Icy
Enchantments.Effect: The first time you fall below half health each fight, Freeze all enemy items for 4 second(s).

Enchantments.Name: Turbo
Enchantments.Effect: The first time you fall below half health each fight, Haste your items for 4 second(s).

Enchantments.Name: Shielded
Enchantments.Effect: The first time you fall below half health each fight, Shield 300.

Enchantments.Name: Restorative
Enchantments.Effect: The first time you fall below half health each fight, Heal 500.

Enchantments.Name: Toxic
Enchantments.Effect: The first time you fall below half health each fight, Poison 30.

Enchantments.Name: Fiery
Enchantments.Effect: The first time you fall below half health each fight, Burn 30.

Enchantments.Name: Radiant
Enchantments.Effect: This cannot be Frozen, Slowed or Destroyed.
